from pyspark.sql.types import IntegerType, ArrayType, StructType, StructField
from pyspark.sql import Row
from pyspark.sql.functions import *

# Get data out of the service bus with additional fields needed for Horizon data
service_bus_data = spark.sql(f"""
                        SELECT DISTINCT
                            NSIPExaminationTimetableID
                            ,caseReference
                            ,published
                            ,events

                            -- Start Horizon columns
                            ,CAST(NULL AS String) AS Location
                            ,CAST(NULL AS String) AS type
                            ,CAST(NULL AS String) as eventTitle
                            ,CAST(NULL As String) As eventTitleWelsh
                            ,CAST(NULL As String) As description
                            ,CAST(NULL As String) As descriptionWelsh
                            ,NULL AS eventDeadlineStartDate
                            ,NULL as date
                            ,NULL As eventLineItems

                            -- End Horizon columns
                            
                            ,Migrated
                            ,ODTSourceSystem
                            ,SourceSystemID
                            ,IngestionDate 
                            ,NULLIF(ValidTo, '') AS ValidTo
                            ,'' as RowID
                            ,IsActive
                        FROM 
                            {service_bus_table}
                        -- where caseReference = 'BC010006'

# Get data out of Horizon and matching the SB schema (with additional fields and ensure data types match)
horizon_data = spark.sql(f"""
                    SELECT DISTINCT 
                        CAST(NULL AS Long) as NSIPExaminationTimetableID
                        ,caseReference
                        ,NULL as published
                        ,null as events
                        ,CAST(ID AS Integer) As eventId
                        ,typeofexamination As type
                        ,Name As eventTitle
                        ,CAST(NULL As String) As eventTitleWelsh
                        ,Description As description
                        ,CAST(NULL As String) As descriptionWelsh
                        ,DeadlineStartDateTime As eventDeadlineStartDate
                        ,Date As date
                        ,NULL As eventLineItems

                        -- Start Horizon Fields Not in SB
                        ,Location
                        -- END Horizon Fields Not in SB

                        ,"0" as Migrated
                        ,"Horizon" as ODTSourceSystem
                        ,NULL AS SourceSystemID
                        ,to_timestamp(expected_from)  AS IngestionDate
                        ,CAST(NULL AS String) as ValidTo -- to avoid any null descrepancies
                        ,'' as RowID
                        ,'Y' as IsActive
                    FROM
                        {horizon_table} AS Horizon
                    WHERE
                    -- caseReference = 'BC010006' and 
                    ingested_datetime = (SELECT MAX(ingested_datetime) FROM {horizon_table})

Now need to sort internal ids, IsActive flags, and valid_to dates

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW vw_nsip_exam_timetable_calculations_base
AS
SELECT  
    row_number() OVER(PARTITION BY caseReference ORDER BY IngestionDate DESC) AS ReverseOrderProcessed
    ,row_number() OVER(ORDER BY IngestionDate asc, caseReference asc) AS NSIPExaminationTimetableID
    ,caseReference
    ,IngestionDate
    ,ValidTo
    ,'0' AS Migrated
    ,CASE row_number() OVER(PARTITION BY caseReference ORDER BY IngestionDate DESC)
        WHEN 1 THEN
            'Y'
        ELSE
            'N'
    END AS IsActive                
FROM
    odw_harmonised_db.nsip_exam_timetable

df_calcs = spark.sql("""
                        SELECT
                            CurrentRow.NSIPExaminationTimetableID
                            ,CurrentRow.caseReference 
                            ,CurrentRow.IngestionDate
                            ,COALESCE(NULLIF(CurrentRow.ValidTo,''), NextRow.IngestionDate) AS ValidTo
                            ,CASE
                                WHEN raw.caseReference IS NOT NULL THEN 
                                    "1"
                                ELSE 
                                    "0"
                            END AS Migrated
                            ,CurrentRow.IsActive
                        FROM
                            vw_nsip_exam_timetable_calculations_base AS CurrentRow
                            LEFT OUTER JOIN vw_nsip_exam_timetable_calculations_base AS NextRow
                                ON CurrentRow.caseReference = NextRow.caseReference
                                AND CurrentRow.ReverseOrderProcessed - 1 = NextRow.ReverseOrderProcessed
                            LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT caseReference FROM  odw_harmonised_db.sb_nsip_exam_timetable) AS Raw
                                ON CurrentRow.caseReference = Raw.caseReference 
                            ORDER BY currentRow.ReverseOrderProcessed

results = spark.sql(f"""
                    SELECT DISTINCT 
                        NSIPExaminationTimetableID
                        ,caseReference
                        ,published
                        ,events

                        --Start Horizon only fields
                        ,Location
                        --End Horizon only fields

                        ,Migrated
                        ,ODTSourceSystem
                        ,IngestionDate
                        ,ValidTo
                        ,MD5(CONCAT(
                                IFNULL(CAST(NSIPExaminationTimetableID AS bigint), '.')
                                ,IFNULL(CAST(caseReference AS integer), '.')
                                ,IFNULL(CAST(published AS String), '.')
                                ,IFNULL(CAST(events AS String), '.')
                                ,IFNULL(CAST(Location AS String), '.')
                                ,IFNULL(CAST(Migrated AS String), '.')
                                ,IFNULL(CAST(ODTSourceSystem AS String), '.')
                                ,IFNULL(CAST(IngestionDate AS String), '.')
                                ,IFNULL(CAST(ValidTo AS String), '.')
                            )
                        ) AS RowID
                        ,IsActive
    FROM 
        {spark_table_final}""")

from pyspark.sql.types import StructType, StructField, StringType, ArrayType, LongType

event_schema = StructType([
    StructField("eventId", LongType(), True),
    StructField("type", StringType(), True),
    StructField("eventTitle", StringType(), True),
    StructField("eventTitleWelsh", StringType(), True),
    StructField("description", StringType(), True),
    StructField("descriptionWelsh", StringType(), True),
    StructField("eventDeadlineStartDate", StringType(), True),
    StructField("date", StringType(), True),
    StructField('eventLineItems', ArrayType(StructType([
                                                StructField('description', StringType(), True), 
                                                StructField('descriptionWelsh', StringType(), True)
                                            ]), True))
])

array_schema = ArrayType(event_schema)
final_df = final_df.withColumn("events", final_df["events"].cast(array_schema))
